XII.i.4.C.4.b
.
Considering a DIC Claim Not Timely Filed
Deductions for an SBP overpayment can be made
only
from the effective date of the DIC award, instead of the effective date of SBP payments, if
a DIC claim is not filed within one year from the date of death of a Veteran, and
the claimant is receiving SBP.
